text: De, Jisasɨlɨn Betani watɨkɨle mfotok ŋɨme loveve. Saimon, andɨvɨli mumuiŋgali safuye avɨtkɨk mfotok love yisɨwove mambatɨk. De, yetɨk melɨn anafak mɨndɨm14.3 Katɨk mɨndɨmɨn Alapasta galavale mɨndɨm. avimbɨlɨm malaŋmɨ ŋɨme loveve. Katɨk avimbɨlɨm kumbaŋɨk anafak kosembɨye maŋam suwove, gasak monikɨk. De, katɨk melɨn avimbɨlɨmkɨk fop matɨvakevekandi anafak kosembɨye maŋam mfafɨlekeve Jisasɨkɨk fopɨk.
